text:
@BuzzFeedNews Free Wuhan than? Tell China it’s a dumb move to block everyone going in and out of the city. Chinese gov won’t do that to contain flu.

I’m quite sure everyone here have had flu at least once and recovered from it(I didn’t💀). Maybe you should Check the mortality rate of the 2!
